title: Cloud Platform STEP Intern
description: I worked on the Frontend Engineering team and collaborated with the CoreInfra UX team to develop user interfaces for Storage products in Google Cloud Platform (Google Kubernetes Engine, Filestore, and Memorystore). I wrote modular, scalable, and well-tested Typescript code that utilizes the Angular framework to develop complex, data-driven user interfaces. I completed the entire development process for the Memorystore Redis Idle Connections feature, including writing design docs, implementation, bug hunt, and phased release to users.

title: Projects Director
description: I coordinate 30+ project teams. I serve as a point of contact between the club and clients. I led the development of a React Native social network application for the University of Chicago RISC Innovation Lab. I hosted weekly stand ups and team member 1:1s to facilitate Agile development process, while also serving as the point of contact between the engineering team and the client.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: I develop various web and mobile tools and resources for the Brown Entrepreneurship Program and the Brown entrepreneurial community at large. My most recent project is Venture@Brown, an interactive guide that gives Brown and RISD a personalized list of entrepreneurial resources on College Hill.

title: Student Worker
description: I helped optimize the paper and electronic document intake process to reduce postage costs, processing turn-around time, and errors in data entry. I also worked with child support participants in both English and Spanish, processed and updated confidential information in California child support database, maintained intranet resources, helped deploy Microsoft Teams, conducted routine computer troubleshooting tasks, and helped manage Microsoft 365 licenses.
